The Hoosiers offense only scored 104 points while the defense allowed 254 points.
==Season== * Hoosiers basketball player [[Quinn Buckner]] played on the team as a defensive back. *In the [[Old Brass Spittoon]], the Hoosiers lost to Michigan State by a score of 14-6. *In the [[Old Oaken Bucket]], the Hoosiers lost to Purdue by a score of 9-7.
